title: "Le Mépris" square gothic on French movie poster (1960s)
content:
Hi there - I hope you can help me find this font (or something like it)  
I am not sure i the second E is it own glyph

Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [MPrisLe copy22.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130912233841/http:/typophile.com/files/MPrisLe%20copy22.jpg) | 54.92 KB |
author: Smukke Arne

comments.content: Type on old movie posters was often hand lettered, so I'm not sure if this is even a typeface at all.
